title: Life. Be in it
creator_credit: Victorian Department of Youth, Sport and Recreation
brief_description: Phillip Adams conceived and developed the “Life Be In It” advertising campaign aimed at encouraging the community to become more involved in physical activity and recreation. Includes examples of television commercials featuring characters such as Norm, the average all-round armchair sportsman.
